page.title: 20Thanks to Codsall
page.content: Other local groups include Codsall Old Peoples' Welfare Committee which keeps a watchful eye on the interests of old folk in the area.There is a local NSPCC branch which raises money. Codsall Ladies Toc H try to spread their ideas of neighbourliness and fairmindedness baa Christian way of life.Codsall Wood Flower Show and Village Committee sees to the interests of this small community as well as raising money for charities and running local functions. Codsall Legionaires Club is a friendly, family club with 1500 members. Codsall Adult Training Centre promotes social skills and independence with mentally handicapped adults. This Project could not have been completed without the freely given help and co operation of pupils,parents and teachers of Codsall Middle School and many members of our local community.
